sentences.en: A : Spitting on the paparazzi. And I am not planning stopping with that!
sentences.cn: 向狗仔队吐口水. 但我不准备停止那样做!

sentences.en: But I know there are people who defend the paparazzi.
sentences.cn: 但是我知道有一些人为狗仔队辩护.

sentences.en: It seemed difficult for the celebrity couple to get rid of the ubiquitous paparazzi.
sentences.cn: 这对名人夫妻想要摆脱无所不在的狗仔队似乎很困难。

sentences.en: Li Xin meets Xiaolin in Thailand coincidentally. Unfortunately, their reunion is exposed by the paparazzi.
sentences.cn: 李信在泰国遇到专程去找他的孝琳, 二人同游后在机场送别, 却不幸被狗仔队发现,更拍下照片.

sentences.en: Paparazzi stalk him at home and trail him in cars.
sentences.cn: 狗仔队在他家周围潜伏,开车尾随他.

sentences.en: Paparazzi were out in force at the Oscar Awards.
sentences.cn: 狗仔队聚集在奥斯卡颁奖典礼场外.

sentences.en: Paparazzi, like the rush, constantly flock Natiao seam.
sentences.cn: 狗仔队, 像一窝蜂, 不断地涌向那条缝.

sentences.en: Rarely did the paparazzi think of her reaction to their pursuit.
sentences.cn: 这些狗仔队鲜少考虑到她对他们的紧追不舍作何反应.

sentences.en: The paparazzi followed the movie star from the airport to her hotel.
sentences.cn: 狗仔队从机场到饭店一路跟踪着该电影明星.
狗仔队会满足这个愿望.

sentences.en: The paparazzi pressed about the famous movie star.
sentences.cn: 狗仔队围着那个著名的电影明星.

sentences.en: The paparazzi pursue Armani wherever he travels.
sentences.cn: 阿玛尼走到哪儿，狗仔队就跟到哪儿。

sentences.en: The rebellious singer is well - quarrelling and fighting with paparazzi.
sentences.cn: 艾伦是位叛逆的歌手,曾和狗仔对骂打架.

sentences.en: The video shows Cam being hunted down by'hood paparazzi'and ending up in graveyard.
sentences.cn: 录像显示了坎姆被胡德.帕帕拉兹穷追捕获.最终结束与墓地.

sentences.en: We knew the paparazzi were following us a jeep, so we tried to shake them off.
sentences.cn: 我们知道有摄影记者乘吉普车跟着我们, 所以我们想摆脱他们.

trans.tran_cn: 专门追逐名人的摄影记者( paparazzo的名词复数 )
